title: Classification of Cotton T-Shirts
text: The product under consideration is a 100% cotton short-sleeve men's t-shirt. The ruling classifies it under HTSUS 6109.10.00.10 as 'T-shirts, singlets and other vests of cotton'.

title: Cotton Denim Jeans
text: These are denim jeans for men made of 100% cotton. They feature five pockets and a zip fly. The ruling classifies them under HTSUS 6203.42.40.10.

title: Cotton Blend Shirts
text: The merchandise consists of shirts made from cotton blend (60% cotton, 40% polyester). The ruling classified these under HTSUS 6205.20.20.20.

title: Classification of Cotton T-Shirts
text: The product under consideration is a 100% cotton short-sleeve men's t-shirt. The ruling classifies it under HTSUS 6109.10.00.10 as 'T-shirts, singlets and other vests of cotton'.

title: Classification of Cotton T-Shirts
text: The product under consideration is a 100% cotton short-sleeve men's t-shirt. The ruling classifies it under HTSUS 6109.10.00.10 as 'T-shirts, singlets and other vests of cotton'.

title: Smart Electronics Watch
text: The product is a wrist-worn smart device with fitness tracking and notification capabilities. It's classified under HTSUS 8517.62.00.90 as a reception apparatus for voice, images or data.

title: Smart Electronics Watch
text: The product is a wrist-worn smart device with fitness tracking and notification capabilities. It's classified under HTSUS 8517.62.00.90 as a reception apparatus for voice, images or data.

title: Portable Electronics Speaker
text: The item is a portable Bluetooth speaker with rechargeable battery. Based on its function as sound reproduction equipment, it's classified under HTSUS 8518.22.00.00.

title: Wireless Electronics Earbuds
text: The merchandise consists of wireless Bluetooth earbuds with charging case. Based on functionality as reception apparatus for sound transmission, they are classified under HTSUS 8518.30.20.00.

title: Smart Electronics Watch
text: The product is a wrist-worn smart device with fitness tracking and notification capabilities. It's classified under HTSUS 8517.62.00.90 as a reception apparatus for voice, images or data.

title: Plastic Office Supplies
text: The items are various plastic office supplies including folders and organizers. They are classified under HTSUS 3926.10.00.00 as office or school supplies of plastic.

title: Plastic Food Containers
text: The merchandise consists of household food storage containers made of plastic. They're classified under HTSUS 3924.10.40.00 as tableware and kitchenware of plastic.

title: Plastic Toys
text: These are children's toys made of plastic material. Based on their intended use for play, they are classified under HTSUS 9503.00.00.00.

title: Plastic Toys
